fn.p: Funding. This work was funded by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (41506137, 41661021 and 41361022), Natural Science Foundation of Guangxi (2016GXNSFBA380037 and 2016JJF15001), the Opening Foundation of Key Laboratory of Environment Change and Resources Use in Beibu Gulf Ministry of Education (Guangxi Teachers Education University), and the Guangxi Key Laboratory of Earth Surface Processes and Intelligent Simulation (Guangxi Teachers Education University) (GTEU-KLOP-K1805).
